text: So, we’re actually in the process of creating a way to add modules to blog posts--inside the actual post area RTE. As part of that, a developer would be able to specify which modules appear in the add module sidebar for blog. If that were possible, would that be sufficient? Or do you still think you’d need to add things directly to the rich text toolbar?
Nice! If we were able to have a create a specific set of modules that we could drop into the blogs, that would be amazing!
Any sense of when that feature might roll out to production?  (Just looking for very rough estimate, like 1 month/1year)
Probably a couple months, but we’re not far from a beta! DM me your portal ID and email if you’re interested in being a beta tester!
